branchCategory.name: M(D)BY-Z, Smooth Air Cylinder
branchCategory.description: The MB single rod, double acting, smooth acting, light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. Perfect for low pressure or low speed applications. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm.
